room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Covington in Covington
review: The room was set up perfectly. The owner was super friendly. This is definitely the most fun you can have in Covington. I recommend everyone stop by and give it a try. You won't regret it!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Covington in Covington
review: Awesome! It was a lot of fun finding the clues in different little rooms. Everything looks very authentic. We finished the game within 57 minutes!

room_title: Escape room "The Heist" by The Escape Covington in Covington
review: Loved the challenge of the room. It was great fun for myself and my family. Very attentive owner - unlike some others I've been to. Excellent choice for fun for everyone!
